skills.name: Lightning Rush
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Shackle Breaker
skills.desc: Consumes Arlan's HP equal to 15% of his Max HP to deal Lightning DMG equal to 120/240/264% of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy. If Arlan does not have sufficient HP, his HP will be reduced to 1 after using his Skill.

skills.name: Frenzied Punishment
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 192/320/346% of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy and Lightning DMG equal to 96/160/173% of Arlan's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

skills.name: Pain and Anger
skills.desc: Increases Arlan's DMG for every percent of HP below his Max HP, up to a max of 36/72/79% more DMG.

traces.name: Revival
traces.desc: If the current HP percentage is 30% or lower when defeating an enemy, immediately restores HP equal to 20% of Max HP.

traces.name: Endurance
traces.desc: The chance to resist DoT Debuffs increases by 50%.

traces.name: Repel
traces.desc: Upon entering battle, if Arlan's HP is less than or equal to 50%, he can nullify all DMG received except for DoT until after he is attacked.

dynamic.playstyle: Arlan, a damage dealer, increases his power by sacrificing HP through his Skill. As his health percentage decreases relative to his Max HP, his damage grows. To protect Arlan from incapacitation at low health, include Preservation characters in the party. When Arlan's health is below 30% and he defeats an enemy, he can heal himself based on his Max HP.  At 50% HP, Arlan gains a shield that blocks the next incoming attack.
lightcones: On the Fall of an Aeon

skills.name: Spectrum Beam
skills.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Asta's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Meteor Storm
skills.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to 25/50/55% of Asta's ATK to a single enemy and further deals DMG for 4 extra times, with each time dealing Fire DMG equal to 25/50/55% of Asta's ATK to a random enemy.

skills.name: Astral Blessing
skills.desc: Increases SPD of all allies by 36/50/53 for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Astrometry
skills.desc: Gains 1 stack of Charging for every different enemy hit by Asta plus an extra stack if the enemy hit has Fire Weakness. For every stack of Charging Asta has, all allies' ATK increases by 7/14/15%, up to 5 time(s). Starting from her second turn, Asta's Charging stack count is reduced by 3 at the beginning of every turn.

traces.name: Sparks
traces.desc: Asta's Basic ATK has a 80% base chance to Burn enemies for 3 turn(s), making the enemy take Fire DoT equal to 50% of Asta's Basic ATK DMG at the start of each turn.

traces.name: Ignite
traces.desc: When Asta is on the field, all allies' Fire DMG increases by 18%.

traces.name: Constellation
traces.desc: Asta's DEF increases by 6% for every current Charging stack she possesses.

dynamic.playstyle: Asta is a valuable combat character for enhancing the damage and speed of your team. Her ultimate ability increases the speed of all team members for two turns, while her talent accumulates Charges, boosting the attack of all fighters up to five times. Remember that Asta needs to hit an enemy to gain a Charge, and three Charges are removed every two turns.
lightcones: Carve the Moon, Weave the Clouds

skills.name: Diagnostic Kick
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Bailu's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Singing Among Clouds
skills.desc: Heals a single ally for 8/11/12% of Bailu's Max HP plus 78/312/347. Bailu then heals random allies 2 time(s). After each healing, HP restored from the next healing is reduced by 15%.

skills.name: Felicitous Thunderleap
skills.desc: Heals all allies for 9/13/14% of Bailu's Max HP plus 90/360/401. Bailu applies Invigoration to allies that are not already Invigorated. For those already Invigorated, Bailu extends the duration of their Invigoration by 1 turn. The effect of Invigoration can last for 2 turn(s). This effect cannot stack.

skills.name: Gourdful of Elixir
skills.desc: After an ally with Invigoration is hit, restores the ally's HP for 4/5/6% of Bailu's Max HP plus 36/144/160. This effect can trigger 2 time(s). When an ally receives a killing blow, they will not be knocked down. Bailu immediately heals the ally for 12/18/19% of Bailu's Max HP plus 120/480/534 HP. This effect can be triggered 1 time per battle.

traces.name: Qihuang Analects
traces.desc: When Bailu heals a target ally above their normal Max HP, the target's Max HP increases by 10% for 2 turns.

traces.name: Vidyadhara Ichor Lines
traces.desc: Invigoration can trigger 1 more time(s).

traces.name: Aquatic Benediction
traces.desc: Characters with Invigoration receive 10% less DMG.

dynamic.playstyle: Bailu is a healing specialist who keeps allies safe and is resilient thanks to scaling off HP. Her Skill, Singing Among Clouds, initially heals one ally and then randomly bounces to two others, including herself. With her Ultimate, Felicitous Thunderleap, Bailu not only heals all allies but also provides a buff called Invigoration, which acts like a pseudo-shield.

skills.name: Windrider Bullet
skills.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Bronya's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Combat Redeployment
skills.desc: Dispels a debuff from a single ally, allows them to immediately take action, and increases their DMG by 33/66/72% for 1 turn(s). When this Skill is used on Bronya herself, she cannot immediately take action again.

skills.name: The Belobog March
skills.desc: Increases the ATK of all allies by 33/55/59%, and increase their CRIT DMG equal to 12/16/17% of Bronya's CRIT DMG plus 12/20/21% for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Leading the Way
skills.desc: After using her Basic ATK, Bronya's next action will be Advanced Forward by 15/30/33%.

traces.name: Command
traces.desc: The CRIT Rate for Basic ATK increases to 100%.

traces.name: Battlefield
traces.desc: At the start of the battle, all allies' DEF increases by 20% for 2 turn(s).

traces.name: Military Might
traces.desc: When Bronya is on the field, all allies deal  10% more DMG.

dynamic.playstyle: Bronya excels with her Combat Redeployment skill, granting an ally an additional turn with boosted damage and removing one debuff. Maximize the use of Bronya's Ultimate to enhance all allies' attack and CRIT DMG. Bronya thrives when paired with a potent DPS character.

skills.name: I Want to Help
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Clara's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Svarog Watches Over You
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to 60/120/132% of Clara's ATK to all enemies, and additionally deals Physical DMG equal to 60/120/132% of Clara's ATK to enemies marked by Svarog with a Mark of Counter. All Marks of Counter will be removed after this Skill is used.

skills.name: Promise, Not Command
skills.desc: After Clara uses Ultimate, DMG dealt to her is reduced by an extra 15/25/27%, and she has greatly increased chances of being attacked by enemies for 2 turn(s). In addition, Svarog's Counter is enhanced. When an ally is attacked, Svarog immediately launches a Counter, and its DMG multiplier against the enemy increases by 96/160/173%. Enemies adjacent to it take 50% of the DMG dealt to the target enemy. Enhanced Counter(s) can take effect 2 time(s).

skills.name: Because We're Family
skills.desc: Under the protection of Svarog, DMG taken by Clara when hit by enemy attacks is reduced by 10%. Svarog will mark enemies who attack Clara with his Mark of Counter and retaliate with a Counter, dealing Physical DMG equal to 80/160/176% of Clara's ATK.

traces.name: Kinship
traces.desc: When attacked, this character has a 35% fixed chance to remove a debuff placed on them.

traces.name: Under Protection
traces.desc: The chance to resist Crowd Control Debuffs increases by 35%.

traces.name: Revenge
traces.desc: Increase Svarog's Counter DMG by 30%.

dynamic.playstyle: Clara is an offensive unit adept at counterattacking enemies. She takes reduced damage and retaliates with a counterattack when attacked. The Mark of Counter mechanic marks enemies who target Clara, making them more vulnerable to her Skill. Clara's Ultimate further reduces damage taken and increases her chances of being targeted. Clara's Ultimate also enhances her counterattack to deal area-of-effect damage when other party members are hit.
lightcones: On the Fall of an Aeon

skills.name: Cloudlancer Art: North Wind
skills.desc: Deal Wind DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Dan Heng's ATK to a target enemy.

skills.name: Cloudlancer Art: Torrent
skills.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to 130/260/286% of Dan Heng's ATK to a single enemy. On a CRIT Hit, there is a 100% base chance to reduce the target's SPD by 12% for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Ethereal Dream
skills.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to 240/400/432% of Dan Heng's ATK to a single enemy. If the enemy is Slowed, Dan Heng's Ultimate's DMG multiplier increases by 72/120/130%.

skills.name: Superiority of Reach
skills.desc: When Dan Heng is the target of an ally's Ability, his next attack's Wind RES PEN increases by 18/36/40%. This effect can be triggered again after 2 turn(s).

traces.name: Hidden Dragon
traces.desc: When current HP percentage is 50% or lower, reduces the chance of being attacked by enemies.

traces.name: Faster Than Light
traces.desc: After launching an attack, there is a 50% fixed chance to increase own SPD by 20% for 2 turn(s).

traces.name: High Gale
traces.desc: Basic ATK deals 40% more damage to Slowed enemies.

dynamic.playstyle: Dan Heng, a single-target DMG dealer, gains enhanced damage on slowed enemies with his Basic Attacks and Ultimate. His Skill can hit a single enemy multiple times, instantly applying Slow on a critical hit. When a party member affects Dan Heng with a Skill, his subsequent attacks bypass enemy Wind RES.

skills.name: Fist of Conviction
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Gepard's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Intimidating Strike
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to 100/200/220% of Gepard's ATK to a single enemy, with a 65% base chance to Freeze that enemy for 1 turn(s). While Frozen, the enemy cannot take action and will take Ice DoT equal to 30/60/66% of Gepard's ATK each turn.

skills.name: Enduring Bulwark
skills.desc: Apply a Shield to all allies, absorbing DMG equal to 30/45/48% of Gepard's DEF plus 150/600/668 for 3 turn(s).

skills.name: Unyielding Will
skills.desc: When struck with a killing blow, instead of becoming incapacitated, Gepard's HP immediately restores 25/50/55% of his Max HP. This effect can only trigger once per battle.

traces.name: Integrity
traces.desc: Gepard has a higher chance to be attacked by enemies.

traces.name: Commander
traces.desc: When Unyielding Will is triggered, Gepard's Energy will be restored to 100%.

traces.name: Fighting Spirit
traces.desc: Gepard's ATK increases by 35% of his current DEF. This effect will refresh at the start of each turn.

dynamic.playstyle: Gepard's special ability, Integrity, draws enemy attention towards him. Using his Ultimate, Gepard creates a shield based on his DEF stat, protecting the entire party for three turns. Furthermore, his Skill performs a triple attack on a single target, greatly increasing the likelihood of freezing enemies and rendering them unable to move.

skills.name: What Are You Looking At?
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Herta's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: One-Time Offer
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Herta's ATK to all enemies. If the enemy's HP percentage is 50% or higher, DMG dealt to this target increases by 20%.

skills.name: It's Magic, I Added Some Magic
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to 120/200/216% of Herta's ATK to all enemies.

skills.name: Fine, I'll Do It Myself
skills.desc: When an ally's attack causes an enemy's HP percentage to fall to 50% or lower, Herta will launch a follow-up attack, dealing Ice DMG equal to 25/40/43% of Herta's ATK to all enemies.

traces.name: Efficiency
traces.desc: When Skill is used, the DMG Boost effect on target enemies increases by an extra 25%.

traces.name: Puppet
traces.desc: The chance to resist Crowd Control Debuffs increases by 35%.

traces.name: Icing
traces.desc: When Ultimate is used, deals 20% more DMG to Frozen enemies.

dynamic.playstyle: Herta's talent enables her to execute follow-up attacks on all enemies when they reach half health. Her Skill, "One-Time Offer," is a straightforward AoE attack dealing Ice DMG to all enemies. If enemies are not at half health, they suffer an additional 20% DMG from this skill. Similarly, Herta's Ultimate, "It's Magic, I Added Some Magic," inflicts Ice DMG on all enemies but with a higher multiplier.

skills.name: Sawblade Tuning
skills.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Himeko's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Molten Detonation
skills.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to 100/200/220% of Himeko's ATK to a single enemy and Fire DMG equal to 40/80/88% of Himeko's ATK to any adjacent enemies.

skills.name: Heavenly Flare
skills.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to 138/230/248% of Himeko's ATK to all enemies. Himeko regenerates 5 extra Energy for each enemy defeated.

skills.name: Victory Rush
skills.desc: When an enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, Himeko gains 1 point of Charge (max 3 points). If Himeko is fully Charged when an ally performs an attack, Himeko immediately performs 1 follow-up attack and deals Fire DMG equal to 70/140/154% of her ATK to all enemies, consuming all Charge points. At the start of the battle, Himeko gains 1 point of Charge.

traces.name: Starfire
traces.desc: After using an attack, there is a 50% base chance to inflict Burn on enemies for 2 turn(s). When afflicted with Burn, enemies take Fire DoT equal to 30% of Himeko's ATK at the start of each turn.

traces.name: Magma
traces.desc: Skill deals 20% more DMG to enemies currently afflicted with Burn.

traces.name: Benchmark
traces.desc: When current HP percentage is 80% or higher, CRIT Rate increases by 15%.

dynamic.playstyle: Himeko is a master of obliterating multiple enemies using powerful Fire attacks like her Ultimate and Follow Up Attack. She gains Charge when an enemy's Weakness breaks, and with three Charge stacks, an ally's attack triggers a devastating AoE Fire Follow Up attack. Additionally, Himeko's attacks deal increased damage to burned enemies. She maintains a higher chance of landing critical hits as long as her HP remains at 80% or above.

skills.name: Hehe! Don't Get Burned!
skills.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Hook's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Hey! Remember Hook?
skills.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to 120/240/264% of Hook's ATK to a single enemy. In addition, there is a 100% base chance to inflict Burn for 2 turn(s). When afflicted with Burn, enemies will take Fire DoT equal to 25/65/71% of Hook's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

enchanced.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to 140/280/308% of Hook's ATK to a single enemy, with a 100% base chance to Burn them for 2 turn(s) and deals Fire DMG equal to 40/80/88% of Hook's ATK to enemies adjacent to it. When afflicted with Burn, enemies will take Fire DoT equal to 25/65/71% of Hook's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

skills.name: Boom! Here Comes the Fire!
skills.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to 240/400/432% of Hook's ATK to a single enemy. After using her Ultimate, the next Skill to be used is Enhanced, which deals DMG to a target enemy and any adjacent enemies.

skills.name: Ha! Oil to the Flames!
skills.desc: When attacking a target afflicted with Burn, deals Additional Fire DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Hook's ATK and regenerates 5 extra Energy.

traces.name: Innocence
traces.desc: Hook restores HP equal to 5% of her Max HP whenever her Talent is triggered.

traces.name: Naivete
traces.desc: The chance to resist Crowd Control Debuffs increases by 35%.

traces.name: Playing With Fire
traces.desc: When using her Ultimate, Hook has her action Advanced Forward by 20% and Hook additionally regenerates 5 Energy.

dynamic.playstyle: Hook, a formidable Main DPS, excels in dealing high single-target damage and inflicting Burn on enemies with her Skill, "Hey! Remember Hook?", which applies significant Fire damage and a two-turn Burn debuff. Empowered by her Ultimate, "Boom! Here Comes the Fire!", the Skill becomes a devastating AoE attack, amplifying its effects. Burned enemies trigger Hook's Talent, "Ha! Oil to the Flames!", granting additional Fire damage and Energy restoration.
lightcones: On the Fall of an Aeon

skills.name: Glistening Light
skills.desc: Jing Yuan deals Lightning DMG equal to 50/100/110% of his ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Rifting Zenith
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Jing Yuan's ATK to all enemies and increases Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action by 2 for the next turn.

skills.name: Lightbringer
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 120/200/216% of Jing Yuan's ATK to all enemies and increases Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action by 3 for the next turn.

skills.name: Prana Extirpated
skills.desc: Summons Lightning-Lord at the start of the battle. Lightning-Lord has 60 base SPD and 3 base Hits Per Action. When the Lightning-Lord takes action, its hits are considered as follow-up attacks, with each hit dealing Lightning DMG equal to 33/66/70% of Jing Yuan's ATK to a single enemy, and enemies adjacent to it also receive Lightning DMG equal to 25% of the DMG dealt to the target enemy.

traces.name: Battalia Crush
traces.desc: If the Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action is greater or equal to 6 in the next turn, its CRIT DMG increases by 25% for the next turn.

traces.name: Savant Providence
traces.desc: At the start of the battle, immediately regenerates 15 Energy.

traces.name: War Marshal
traces.desc: After using Skill, CRIT Rate increases by 10% for 2 turn(s).

dynamic.playstyle: Jing Yuan stands as the game's most potent AoE DMG dealer. Maximizing the use of his Skill and Ultimate prior to the Lightning-Lord's turn is crucial to amplify the subsequent follow-up attacks. Upon unlocking the Bonus Ability, War Martial, Jing Yuan's CRIT Rate rises by 10% after employing his skill.

skills.name: Frigid Cold Arrow
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to 50/100/110% of March 7th's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: The Power of Cuteness
skills.desc: Provides a single ally with a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 38/57/61% of March 7th's DEF plus 190/760/846 for 3 turn(s). If the ally's HP is 30% of their Max HP or higher, greatly increases the chance of enemies attacking that ally.

skills.name: Glacial Cascade
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to 90/150/162% of March 7th's ATK to all enemies. Hit enemies have a 50% base chance to be Frozen for 1 turn(s). While Frozen, the enemy cannot act and will recieve additional Ice DMG equal to 30/60/66% of March 7th's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

skills.name: Girl Power
skills.desc: After a shielded ally is attacked by an enemy, March 7th immediately Counters, dealing Ice DMG equal to 50/100/110% of her ATK. This effect can be triggered 2 time(s) each turn.

traces.name: Purify
traces.desc: Skill removes 1 debuff from an ally.

traces.name: Reinforce
traces.desc: The duration of the Shield generated from her Skill is extended for 1 turn(s).

traces.name: Ice Spell
traces.desc: Increases Ultimate's base chance to Freeze enemies by 15%.

dynamic.playstyle: March 7th's Skill grants a DEF-scaling shield to a chosen party member. If the shielded character has over 30% HP, they become a target more frequently. At A2, March can remove debuffs using her Skill. When an enemy attacks a shielded character, March retaliates with a Follow Up attack. Her Ultimate deals AoE Ice damage and has a chance to Freeze enemies.
lightcones: Day One of My New Life

skills.name: Behind the Kindness
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Natasha's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Love, Heal, and Choose
skills.desc: Restores a single ally for 7/10/11% of Natasha's Max HP plus 70/280/312. Restores the ally for another 5/7/8% of Natasha's Max HP plus 48/192/214 at the beginning of each turn for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Gift of Rebirth
skills.desc: Heals all allies for 9/14/15% of Natasha's Max HP plus 92/368/409.

skills.name: Innervation
skills.desc: When healing allies with HP percentage at 30% or lower, increases Natasha's Outgoing Healing by 25/50/55%. This effect also works on continuous healing.

traces.name: Soothe
traces.desc: The Skill removes 1 debuff(s) from a target ally.

traces.name: Healer
traces.desc: Natasha's Outgoing Healing increases by 10%.

traces.name: Recuperation
traces.desc: Increases the duration of her Skill's continuous healing effect for 1 turn(s).

dynamic.playstyle: Natasha epitomizes the role of a pure healer. Her Skill, "Love, Heal, and Choose," heals a single ally and provides a small heal over time for the subsequent two turns. With her Ultimate, "Gift of Rebirth," Natasha restores a substantial amount of health to all allies based on her HP.

skills.name: Frost Shot
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Pela's ATK as to a single enemy.

skills.name: Frostbite
skills.desc: Removes 1 buff(s) and deals Ice DMG equal to 105/210/231% of Pela's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Zone Suppression
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to 60/100/108% of Pela's ATK to all enemies, with a base chance of 100% to inflict the Exposed on all enemies. When Exposed, enemies' DEF is reduced by 30/40/42% for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Data Collecting
skills.desc: If the enemy is debuffed after Pela's attack, Pela will restore 5/10/11 extra Energy. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per attack.

traces.name: Bash
traces.desc: Deals 20% more DMG to debuffed enemies.

traces.name: The Secret Strategy
traces.desc: When Pela is on the battlefield, all allies' Effect Hit Rate increases by 10%.

traces.name: Wipe Out
traces.desc: Using Skill to remove buff(s) increases the DMG of Pela's next attack by 20%.

dynamic.playstyle: Pela enhances ally damage by debuffing enemies' DEF and turns the tide of battle by dispelling positive effects. Her Skill, "Frostbite," removes buffs from enemies, while her Ultimate, "Zone Suppression," reduces enemy DEF. Additionally, Pela's Talent, "Data Collecting," grants Energy upon inflicting debuffs, allowing her to activate her Ultimate more frequently.
lightcones: Resolution Shines As Pearls of Sweat
In the Name of the World

skills.name: Flower Pick
skills.desc: Tosses 1 jade tile from the suit with the fewest tiles in hand to deal Quantum DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy.

enchanced.desc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to 120/240/264% of Qingque's ATK to a single enemy, and deals Quantum DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Qingque's ATK to enemies adjacent to it. "Cherry on Top!" cannot recover Skill Points.

skills.name: A Scoop of Moon
skills.desc: Immediately draws 2 jade tile(s) and increases DMG by 14/28/31% until the end of the current turn. This effect can stack up to 4 time(s). The turn will not end after this Skill is used.

skills.name: A Quartet? Woo-hoo!
skills.desc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to 120/200/216% of Qingque's ATK to all enemies, and obtain 4 jade tiles of the same suit.

skills.name: Celestial Jade
skills.desc: When an ally's turn starts, Qingque randomly draws 1 tile from 3 different suits and can hold up to 4 tiles at one time. If Qingque starts her turn with 4 tiles of the same suit, she consumes all tiles to enter the "Hidden Hand" state. While in this state, Qingque cannot use her Skill again. At the same time, Qingque's ATK increases by 36/72/79%, and her Basic ATK "Flower Pick" is enhanced, becoming "Cherry on Top!"  The "Hidden Hand" state ends after using "Cherry on Top!".

traces.name: Tile Battle
traces.desc: Restores 1 Skill Point when using the Skill. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per battle.

traces.name: Bide Time
traces.desc: Using the Skill increases DMG Boost effect of attacks by an extra 10%.

traces.name: Winning Hand
traces.desc: Qingque's SPD increases by 10% for 1 turn after using the Enhanced Basic ATK.

dynamic.playstyle: Qingque, a luck-based Main DPS, leverages her Skill "A Scoop of Moon" to draw two tiles and stack up to four DMG buffs without ending her turn. When Qingque accumulates four matching tiles, her Basic ATK receives a massive DMG boost, enabling her to strike adjacent enemies. This enhanced ATK does not generate Skill Points. With her Ultimate, "A Quartet? Woo-hoo!," Qingque unleashes heavy Quantum DMG upon all enemies while obtaining four matching tiles, ensuring her relentless onslaught of AoE DMG.

skills.name: Dazzling Blades
skills.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Sampo's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Ricochet Love
skills.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to 28/56/62% of Sampo's ATK to a single enemy, and further deals DMG for 4 extra time(s), with each time dealing Wind DMG equal to 28/56/62% of Sampo's ATK to a random enemy.

skills.name: Surprise Present
skills.desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to 96/160/172% of Sampo's ATK to all enemies, with a 100% base chance to increase the target's DoT taken by 20/30/32% for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Windtorn Dagger
skills.desc: Sampo's attacks have a 65% base chance to inflict Wind Shear for 3 turn(s). Enemies inflicted with Wind Shear will take Wind DoT equal to 20/52/57% of Sampo's ATK at the beginning of each turn. Wind Shear can stack up to 5 time(s).

traces.name: Trap
traces.desc: Extends the duration of Wind Shear caused by Talent by 1 turn.

traces.name: Defensive Position
traces.desc: Using Ultimate additionally regenerates 10 Energy.

traces.name: Spice Up
traces.desc: Enemies with Wind Shear effect deal 15% less damage to Sampo.

dynamic.playstyle: Sampo's primary mechanic involves stacking Wind Shear on enemies, inflicting DoT based on his ATK stat. His Basic attacks, Skill, and Ultimate can apply Wind Shear thanks to his Talent. Both his Skill and Ultimate deal AoE damage, allowing Wind Shear to stack on multiple enemies. Additionally, Sampo's Ultimate benefits other party members' DoT Debuffs, such as Bleed, Shock, Burn, Freeze, and Wind Shear.
lightcones: In the Name of the World

skills.name: Thwack
skills.desc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Seele's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Sheathed Blade
skills.desc: Increases Seele's SPD by 25% for 2 turn(s) and deals Quantum DMG equal to 110/220/242% of Seele's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Butterfly Flurry
skills.desc: Seele enters the buffed state and deals Quantum DMG equal to 255/425/459% of Seele's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Resurgence
skills.desc: Enters the buffed state upon defeating an enemy with Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, and receives an extra turn. While in the buffed state, the DMG of Seele's attacks increases by 40/80/88% for 1 turn(s). Enemies defeated in the extra turn provided by "Resurgence" will not trigger another "Resurgence."

traces.name: Nightshade
traces.desc: When current HP percentage is 50% or lower, reduces the chance of being attacked by enemies.

traces.name: Lacerate
traces.desc: While Seele is in the buffed state, her Quantum RES PEN increases by 20%.

traces.name: Rippling Waves
traces.desc: After using a Basic ATK, Seele's next action will be Advanced Forward by 20%.

dynamic.playstyle: Seele's main mechanic, Resurgence, grants her an extra turn upon defeating an enemy. To perform the Double Resurgence trick, defeat an enemy with a Basic Attack or Skill, activate Seele's Ultimate before the turn ends, use her Ultimate to eliminate another enemy, and defeat a third enemy with a Basic Attack or Skill. This enables you to double your Resurgence and gain two additional turns. Seele's Technique grants her stealth in the overworld, and attacking while in this state triggers automatic Resurgence at the start of battles.

skills.name: Roaring Thunderclap
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Serval's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Lightning Flash
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 70/140/154% of Serval's ATK to a single enemy and Lightning DMG equal to 30/60/66% of Serval's ATK to enemies adjacent to it, with a 80% base chance for enemies hit to become Shocked for 2 turn(s). While Shocked, enemies take Lightning DoT equal to 40/104/114% of Serval's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

skills.name: Here Comes the Mechanical Fever
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to 108/180/194% of Serval's ATK to all enemies. Enemies already Shocked will extend the duration of their Shock state by 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Galvanic Chords
skills.desc: After Serval attacks, deals additional Lightning DMG equal to 36/72/79% of Serval's ATK to all Shocked enemies.

traces.name: Rock 'n' Roll
traces.desc: Skill has a 20% increased base chance to Shock enemies.

traces.name: String Vibration
traces.desc: At the start of the battle, immediately regenerates 15 Energy.

traces.name: Mania
traces.desc: Upon defeating an enemy, ATK increases by 20% for 2 turn(s).

dynamic.playstyle: Serval excels at dealing strong Lightning AoE DMG to multiple enemies and inflicting Shock, a damage over time effect, with her Skill. Her Ultimate not only deals a huge chunk of DMG, but also extends the duration of Shock on affected enemies. Unlocking Mania at Character Ascension 6 grants Serval a 20% ATK boost for 2 turns after defeating an enemy. It is ideal to defeat an enemy before using her Ultimate for optimal DMG output.

skills.name: Cloudfencer Art: Starshine
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Sushang's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Cloudfencer Art: Mountainfall
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to 105/210/231% of Sushang's ATK to a single enemy. In addition, there is a 33% chance to trigger Sword Stance on the final hit, dealing Additional Physical DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Sushang's ATK to the enemy. If the enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, Sword Stance is guaranteed to trigger.

skills.name: Shape of Taixu: Dawn Herald
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to 192/320/346% of Sushang's ATK to a single enemy and immediately Advances her action forward by 100%. In addition, Sushang's ATK increases by 18/30/32% and using her Skill has 2 extra chances to trigger Sword Stance for 2 turn(s). Sword Stance triggered from the extra chances deals 50% of the original DMG.

skills.name: Dancing Blade
skills.desc: When an enemy has their Weakness Broken on the field, Sushang's SPD increases by 15/20/21% for 2 turn(s).

traces.name: Guileless
traces.desc: When current HP percentage is 50% or lower, reduces the chance of being attacked by enemies.

traces.name: Riposte
traces.desc: For every Sword Stance triggered, the DMG dealt by Sword Stance increases by 2.5%. Stacks up to 10 time(s).

traces.name: Vanquisher
traces.desc: After using Basic ATK or Skill, if there are enemies on the field with Weakness Break, Sushang's action is Advanced Forward by 15%.

dynamic.playstyle: Sushang is a powerful DPS unit specializing in dealing high Physical DMG through the Sword Stance mechanic. Sword Stance is an additional instance of Physical DMG triggered by breaking an enemy's Weakness, both with her Skill and Ultimate. Additionally, her SPD increases when a party member breaks an enemy's Weakness. Sushang also advances herself forward after using her Basic Attack or Skill if there are enemies on the field with Weakness Break. Her Ultimate inflicts massive DMG and advances her turn by 100%, granting her an extra turn.

skills.name: Dislodged
skills.desc: Tingyun deals Lightning DMG equal to 50/100/110% of her ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Soothing Melody
skills.desc: Grants a single ally with Benediction to increase their ATK by 25/50/55%, up to 15/25/27% of Tingyun's current ATK. When the ally with Benediction attacks, they will deal Additional Lightning DMG equal to 20/40/44% of that ally's ATK for 1 time. Benediction lasts for 3 turn(s) and is only effective on the most recent receiver of Tingyun's Skill.

skills.name: Amidst the Rejoicing Clouds
skills.desc: Regenerates 50 Energy for a single ally and increases the target's DMG by 20/50/56% for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Violet Sparknado
skills.desc: When an enemy is attacked by Tingyun, the ally with Benediction immediately deals Additional Lightning DMG equal to 30/60/66% of that ally's ATK to the same enemy.

traces.name: Nourished Joviality
traces.desc: Tingyun's SPD increases by 20% for 1 turn after using Skill.

traces.name: Knell Subdual
traces.desc: Basic ATK DMG increases by 40%.

traces.name: Jubilant Passage
traces.desc: Tingyun immediately regenerates 5 Energy at the start of her turn.

dynamic.playstyle: Tingyun's Skill grants the Benediction buff to the targeted character, increasing their ATK and enabling additional instances of Lightning DMG. Her Ultimate further enhances the targeted character's DMG and restores their energy.
lightcones: Carve the Moon, Weave the Clouds

skills.name: Ice-Breaking Light
skills.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to 50/100/110% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a target enemy and gain 1 stack of Magma Will.

enchanced.desc: Consumes 4 stacks of Magma Will to enhance Basic ATK, dealing Fire DMG equal to 90/135/146% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy and Fire DMG to equal to 36/54/58% of the Trailblazer's ATK to adjacent enemies.

skills.name: Ever-Burning Amber
skills.desc: Increases the Trailblazer's DMG Reduction by 40/50/52% and gains 1 stack of Magma Will, with a 100% base chance to Taunt all enemies for 1 turn(s).

skills.name: War-Flaming Lance
skills.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to 50/100/110% of the Trailblazer's ATK plus 75/150/165% of the Trailblazer's DEF to all enemies. The next Basic ATK will be automatically enhanced and does not cost Magma Will.

skills.name: Treasure of the Architects
skills.desc: Each time the Trailblazer is hit, they gain 1 stack of Magma Will for a max of 8 stack(s). When Magma Will has no fewer than 4 stacks, the Trailblazer's Basic ATK becomes enhanced, dealing DMG to a single enemy and enemies adjacent to it. When the Trailblazer uses Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, apply a Shield to all allies that absorbs DMG equal to 4/6/6% of the Trailblazer's DEF plus 20/80/89. The Shield lasts for 2 turn(s).

traces.name: The Strong Defends the Weak
traces.desc: After using the Skill, the DMG taken by all allies reduces by 15% for 1 turn(s).

traces.name: Unwavering Gallantry
traces.desc: Using Enhanced Basic ATK restores the Trailblazer's HP by 5% of their Max HP.

traces.name: Action Beats Overthinking
traces.desc: When the Trailblazer is protected by a Shield at the beginning of the turn, increases ATK by 15% and regenerates 5 Energy until the action is over.

dynamic.playstyle: Trailblazer's Skill taunts enemies and grants him 1 stack. Each time the Trailblazer is hit, he gains 1 stack of Magma Will for a max of 8 stack(s). Consuming 4 stacks enhances his Basic ATK, dealing damage to a single enemy and adjacent enemies. The first Eidolon unlocks the enhanced attack, adding damage based on Trailblazer's DEF. His Ultimate deals damage scaling with ATK and DEF. After using the Ultimate, his next Basic ATK is automatically enhanced without consuming Magma Will stacks.

skills.name: Farewell Hit
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to 50/100/110% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: RIP Home Run
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG equal to 62/125/137% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy and enemies adjacent to it.

skills.name: Stardust Ace
skills.desc:
Choose between two attack modes to deliver a full strike.
Blowout: Farewell Hit deals Physical DMG equal to 300/450/480% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy. Blowout: RIP Home Run deals Physical DMG equal to 180/270/288% of the Trailblazer's ATK to a single enemy, and Physical DMG equal to 108/162/172% of the Trailblazer's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

skills.name: Perfect Pickoff
skills.desc: Each time the Trailblazer inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, the Trailblazer's ATK increases by 10/20/22%. This effect stacks up to 2 time(s).

traces.name: Ready for Battle
traces.desc: At the start of the battle, immediately regenerates 15 Energy.

traces.name: Perseverance
traces.desc: Each stack of Talent increases the Trailblazer's DEF by 10%.

traces.name: Fighting Will
traces.desc: When using Skill or Ultimate Blowout: RIP Home Run, DMG dealt to the target enemy is increased by 25%.

dynamic.playstyle: Upon reaching Ascension 6, Trailblazer gains a 25% DMG Boost to his Skill or Ultimate from his Skill. Unlocking the 6th Eidolon further enhances his capabilities, granting him up to a 20% ATK boost when performing a Weakness Break or defeating an enemy. Additionally, the 4th Eidolon provides a 25% CRIT Rate boost against enemies with Weakness Break.
lightcones: On the Fall of an Aeon

skills.name: Gravity Suppression
skills.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Welt's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Edge of the Void
skills.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 36/72/79% of Welt's ATK to a single enemy and further deals DMG 2 extra times, with each time dealing Imaginary DMG equal to 36/72/79% of Welt's ATK to a random enemy. On hit, there is a 65/75/77% base chance to reduce the enemy's SPD by 10% for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Synthetic Black Hole
skills.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 90/150/162% of Welt's ATK to all enemies, with a 100% base chance for enemies hit by this ability to be Imprisoned for 1 turn. Imprisoned enemies have their actions delayed by 32/40/42% and SPD reduced by 10%.

skills.name: Time Distortion
skills.desc: When hitting an enemy that is already Slowed, Welt deals Additional Imaginary DMG equal to 30/60/66% of his ATK to the enemy.

traces.name: Retribution
traces.desc: When using Ultimate, there is a 100% base chance to increase the DMG received by the targets by 12% for 2 turn(s).

traces.name: Judgment
traces.desc: Using Welt's Ultimate additionally regenerates 10 Energy.

traces.name: Punishment
traces.desc: Deals 20% more DMG to enemies inflicted with Weakness Break.

dynamic.playstyle: Welt's Skill bounces off multiple enemies, allowing him to easily Weakness Break with Imaginary. When the Toughness Bar of enemies is broken by an Imaginary Element character, they are afflicted with Imprison, delaying their action and reducing their SPD. Welt's Talent boosts his damage against Slowed enemies. With his A2 unlocked, casting Welt's Ultimate increases enemy damage received by 12%. After unlocking his A6 passive, allies dealing with enemies with broken Toughness Bars deal 20% more damage.
lightcones: In the Name of the World
Resolution Shines As Pearls of Sweat

skills.name: Frost Thorn
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to 50/100/110% of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Darting Ironthorn
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to 110/220/242% of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy and activates Soulsteel Sync for 1 turn.

skills.name: Amidst the Raining Bliss
skills.desc: Increases Yanqing's CRIT Rate by 60%. When Soulsteel Sync is active, increases Yanqing's CRIT DMG by an extra 30/50/54% for 1 turn. Afterwards, deals Ice DMG equal to 210/350/378% of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: One With the Sword
skills.desc: When Soulsteel Sync is active, Yanqing is less likely to be attacked by enemies. Yanqing's CRIT Rate increases by 15/20/21% and his CRIT DMG increases by 15/30/33%. After Yanqing attacks an enemy, there is a 50/60/62% fixed chance to perform a follow-up attack, dealing Ice DMG equal to 25/50/55% of Yanqing's ATK to the enemy, which has a 65% base chance to Freeze the enemy for 1 turn. The Frozen target cannot take action and receives Additional Ice DMG equal to 25/50/55% of Yanqing's ATK at the beginning of each turn. When Yanqing receives DMG, the Soulsteel Sync effect will disappear.

traces.name: Icing on the Kick
traces.desc: When Yanqing attacks, deals additional Ice DMG equal to 30% of Yanqing's ATK to targets with Ice Weakness.

traces.name: Frost Favors the Brave
traces.desc: When Soulsteel Sync is active, Effect RES increases by 20%.

traces.name: Gentle Blade
traces.desc: When a CRIT Hit is triggered, increases SPD by 10% for 2 turn(s).

dynamic.playstyle: Yanqing is a powerful Main DPS who deals high damage with Soulsteel Sync, but loses it upon taking damage. Yanqing's Skill, Darting Ironthorn, inflicts Ice damage on an enemy and triggers Soulsteel Sync. Soulsteel Sync provides a 15% increase in Crit Rate and Crit Damage, a 50% chance of performing a follow-up attack with a 65% chance of freezing the target, and frozen enemies take Ice damage at the start of each turn. Yanqing's Ultimate, Amidst the Raining Bliss, deals Ice damage to a single enemy and further boosts his Crit Rate. If Soulsteel Sync is active, it also increases his Crit Damage.
